sub_title: Account- and Productmanager Coco products at Bol Peat

profile_positions.description:
Bol Peat is a well-established international trader and supplier of peat, raw materials and other growing media constituents to substrate producers and horticulture suppliers worldwide. 

From my position in the coir industry I have a vast experience in worldwide trading, sales and production in the supply chain of horticultural products. Over the years I have built connections all over the world, I learned to adapt to different cultures and to deal with different insights and possibilities, always looking for solutions instead of problems. Worldwide horticulture has to change fast towards safe and sustainable products to meet the growing global demand. I am excited to be part of that!

For the production of coir products I visit India and Sri Lanka on a regular basis. I am focussed on planning, quality, consistency and continuity in collaboration with partnes and local suppliers. Understandig and adapting to local cultures is essential to doing business on a mutual respectful basis.

For sales I focus on the main markets in Europe as well as other markets worldwide. This can be as supplier of raw materials to substrate manufacturers, endproducts via dealers or direct to bigger growers.  Listening to the users and understanding the differences in climate, growing techniques and possibilites are the basis for offering the best products in every situation.

I am always open to discuss possibilities to improve busines wise and personally.
profile_positions.title: Account- and Productmanager Coco products

profile_positions.location: Maasdijk, The Netherlands (Production in India and Sri Lanka)
profile_positions.description:
Shakti Cocos B.V. originated from the Dutch Company Van der Gaag Portgrond B.V., a family business with several generations of experience in potting soil and substrates. With the emergence of cocos as a substrate in the 1980s, the need arose to have control over quality, product developments and delivery reliability. From this realization, Shakti Cocos B.V. is one of the first companies in the world to have started with own production factories in India and Sri Lanka.

With the headoffice in The Netherlands and local partners on the own production facilities in India and Sri Lanka, Shakti Cocos B.V. focuses on the production and development of Coir Substrates. Next to the standard ways of production and packing, Shakti Cocos B.V. is specialized in custom made sollution for mixes, treatments and packing.

One of the inventions of Shakti Cocos B.V. is Shakti Amla®, Cocos with a low pH. This makes substrates of pure cocos suitable for crops that require a low pH such as Blueberry, Raspberry and many others.

Check what Shakti Cocos B.V. can do for you on www.ShaktiCocos.com and contact us via info@ShaktiCocos.com
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.location: The Netherlands, India and Sri Lanka
profile_positions.description:
MeeGaa Substrates B.V. / Shakti Cocos B.V. is your first port of call for high quality substrates and coir products. With a pottingsoil company in The Netherlands and own coirfactories in India and Sri Lanka we are your reliable and dedicated supplier of coir products as raw materials for the production of mixes or as substrate for all kind of crops such as pot plants, cut flowers, vegetables, tree-nursery and soft fruit.

Based on our years of experience and knowledge we always search for the best solution for you. MeeGaa Substrates B.V. / Shakti Cocos B.V. is a pioneer in the field of coir products. As an innovative partner we can supply you with coir in compressed 5-kg bales, 25-kg bales and growbags direct from India and Sri Lanka under the brandname Shakti Cocos. We can also supply you with ready-to-use mixtures from the Netherlands as the basis for your succes.

One of our developments is Shakti Amla, a sensation in the field of coir products with a stable low pH, excellent growing properties and produced in a more sustainable way compared to traditional coir. Shakti Amla is your proven key to 100 % peat-free organic growing media. Independant research achieved amazing results on crops like Gerbera, a variety of pot plants, Strawberry and Raspberry. 

To guarantee you with the best products we are RHP-, ISO-, RAL- and BIO-certified. To guarantee our social responsibility we are SA-8000 certified as well.

My job in the company is Product Specialist Cocos and Export Manager. For more information or enquiries please contact me.

Let's together improve your succes with a basis of Shakti Cocos !!
profile_positions.title: Product Specialist Cocos / Export Manager

profile_positions.description: Bato Plastics B.V. is producer and developer of plastic moulding products, mainly for horticultural purposes. As account manager I was responsible for the sales of this products in Eastern Europe, Africa, The Balkan, a part of Southern Europe, United Kingdom and Europe.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Dutch Plantin is producer and trader in coco products for the professional horticulture. The company has production facilities in India, Sri Lanka, Ghana and The Netherlands. The head office is in The Netherlands and there is an office in India. The product is used as a growing substrate or in potting soil all over the world.

As a manager I was responsible for production in India and Holland, quality and quality-certificates, product developement, planning, contacts with local gouvernements, daily business in The Netherlands etc.
profile_positions.title: Manager

profile_positions.description: Van Kleef Roses B.V. is agent for Tantua Rosen in The Netherlands, Belgium, Kenya, Ethiopia and Israel. As account manager I was responsible for sales in the South of The Netherlands and Belgium.
profile_positions.title: account manager
